website_summaries.verdict: This set of 3 heavy-duty knives may not be ideal for beginners, but experienced throwers will definitely appreciate them.
pros: Heavy enough for professional use, with a 12" overall length
cons: Sheath doesn't hold all 3 knives securely

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knives
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, nice design, and feels great in the hand. I am just learning and this is my seventh set of knives to try, really liked that they are competition weight and size and I like these alot, ordered two sets intending one for a display case with my other collectable knives but really tempted to use all six and get a third set for display. They are not sharp at all so you can hold by the blade and throw. The weight helps them stick good and balance is just right.
customer_reviews.author: QUINTIN NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Too big to stick.
customer_reviews.text: These things are too big and clunky to use for anything other than garden tools. By that I mean they may be useful for cleaning up dog dirt, or digging up weeds in your vegetable garden, but that is about it. When used as poop scoop utensils you can use two at a time, like chopsticks, and save the third one as a replacement in case you are foolish enough to throw one of these at a passing stray dog and he is smart enough to run away with it. Don't worry about hitting the dog with the knife: that is not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: james f.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice throwing knife
customer_reviews.text: These are of a good professional design, which is excellent for about every technique of knife throwing. I'm very satisfied with the weight, length, width and overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Show

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking knives, and they have a good weight; but they ring like a bell every time I miss, which is way more often than with my cold steel true flight throwers. That and the sheath holds all three, but the safety clasp won't snap around all three. It seems like others have complained about that too, so I doubt that I have the one defective sheath. Also the quality of the leather seems pretty cheap to me. So if it isn't functional or aesthetically pleasing, what good is it? I'm very new to throwing, but these require a lot more finesse than the other knives I have.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: These knives are excellent. I had the enjoyment to take these out ...
customer_reviews.text: These knives are excellent. I had the enjoyment to take these out in my back hard and practice on a big stump tree I have. Its the perfect density to allow these knives to stick. I've been looking up training videos to learn how to correctly and properly throw these knives using different methods. these have a wonderful weight and don't feel the least bit brittle to break. Plus they come in a sturdy leather carrying case that slides right onto your belt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well made, big and heavy. Nice throwers!
customer_reviews.text: These throwers are excellent! Be advised they are rather large and somewhat heavy. I think they will last a long time. Well built and the blades handle nicely. I don't necessarily think they are for beginners, but for the knife thrower looking to up their game, these will surely work.
customer_reviews.author: 101st Airborne Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Start Small
customer_reviews.text: These throwing knives are very sturdy and solid. However, I do not recommend them if you are first starting out. This is due to the size and weight of the knives. The size was a problem to me because when I got these I wasn't expecting the blade to be on my hand and due to me being new at it was just strange at first. The weight is also a little overwhelming when you're just starting out. So I recommend a light cheap throwing knife set before you start using these.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: ... off right out of the box the knives are beautiful. They have a fair amount of weight to ...
customer_reviews.text: First off right out of the box the knives are beautiful. They have a fair amount of weight to them so throwing them can be a workout for your arm especially since the blade is thicker so in order to get it to penetrate a target you need to put more power into your throws but since it is heavier and well balanced it is still easy to control the spin when you are throwing.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Dont expect them to last long....
customer_reviews.text: Knife throws well.....but less the 20 days old and I've already had one bounce off the wooden target and snap in mid air from vibration. No concrete or metal for them to hit only wood and dirt. I question the quality of the design and the metal they use because I'm not the only one who has had these knifes snap!
customer_reviews.author: WWolf

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced and durable, remember it's technique not strength
customer_reviews.text: Nice set I've had them for years good balance and durable TIP: if your new to throwing knives use finesse and get your Technique down preferably in cardboard Target or bale of straw
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: good knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are big and a bit heavy, they throw great, the tips are strong and have not bent or broken and are still sharp after extreme use. I put these knives through ridiculous treatment practically everyday it wasn't raining for an entire summer (throwing as hard as I can and from great distances, landing in gravel/rocks and throwing into hard wood and hillsides) and other than a few nicks they are still in great condition. The sheath is ugly and cheap but it's sturdy enough and does its job. I'd recommend these to anyone, I think these things will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great no-spin knife
customer_reviews.text: Has been a very good no-spin knife...i wish the same model would be made that would meet competition regulations. This one is close but shorter and lighter than allowed. I don't have current specs...i am a beginner and looked at a local competition announcement.
customer_reviews.author: hugh

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for the buck!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my first set 2 weeks ago and after throwing them for 30 minutes i ordered a second set. Very well balanced, and has a great feel. Im new to throwing knives and in just 14 days Im already throwing tight 6 inch groups!! A few misses here and there but you just cant beat these knives. I just bought my 3rd set online today and cant wait to get them. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!! This is an awesome knife set!!!! Highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Judd

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: These were bought by my son. A heavy duty knife. Well balanced. My son uses a no spin technique with these and they throw very well. A heavy knife, these do some serious damage to the target. The target was made of 2 by 6's these knives chewed it up very quickly. Some serious penetration. They are well balanced and I imagine they would work very well with a spin technique also.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great set to learn or just have fun with. Made well and throw nice.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Quinno

customer_reviews.title: It dents and chips easily.
customer_reviews.text: This knife chips easily, the weight is nice and heavy. For the price, I guess it's worth it if you know how to maintenance a blade. Would be great if this was made out of carbon 1095 steel.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Robert

customer_reviews.title: Throws wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great time throwing these I throw a lot and definitely consider getting more good for all stiles of throwing the back end is not as pointed as you think it won’t stick on the wrong side
customer_reviews.author: josh m.

customer_reviews.title: Fun throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these knives. Very heavy, good for spin throws. After throwing for about an hour there was a small nick in one of them that I buffed out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mullinix

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: As the saying goes.....You get what you pay for. These are one of my top 2 favorite throwing knives. Very well made and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice Solid with Good Weight Balance
customer_reviews.text: Nicely balanced with good weight. At first I was unsure about the larger 12” long thrower, however after seeing and feeling how weight is well balanced I’m glad I got the 12” set over the 7-8” throwers.
customer_reviews.author: 02doooce

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I have had these knives for a long time they are still plenty sharp. The only real problem is the size. They are sum what large compared to most throwing knives. The size should not be a problem unless you are really small tho. So overall these knives are amazing
customer_reviews.author: CharlieMike413

customer_reviews.title: shipping fail
customer_reviews.text: The knives are beautiful and maybe its just me. But when I got them the blades were all nicked up and one of them was really bad. The product looked new and was packaged as new. I think they were damaged by poor packaging. Little box in a really big box with nothing to hold it in place. I waited a week for dissapointment in the ammount of 40 $
customer_reviews.author: n8

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: Knives are balanced well. Blade is sharpened all the way down the sides until it hits the handle, so be aware. Beautiful to look at, heavy, and feel really great in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: JS.KiMoss

customer_reviews.title: BEST THOWING KNIFE SET
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of the knife, the finish, durability, and the case. Also, point is sharp, but the edges aren't particularly flat which I think is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Tom

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend so that he can have something to throw at my targets. He loved them I thought that they felt a little heavy. I forgot that they were a foot long from the time that I ordered them to the time that they arrived as they seemed a bit excessive compared to my 6" set. Seems to be great quality for the price, very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ~Kristi~

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous knives!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I love these. Started with a cheap set and got into throwing. These are high quality and make the 3 knives for $15 sets look like toys. Each knife is heavier than all three of the cheap sets. I love them. Can't recommend any more highly to anyone interested in getting into throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Rlilgeberg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE TK's! Edges are rounded and super nice feel in your hand. Long and heavy! Excellent quality. Well worth money spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Boling

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: this is the type of equipment i imagine when i think of throwing knives. perfect balance, well made, intimidating design and substantially sized. i've had mine a few weeks and the tips and edges are all still good as new, the balance makes the spin so predictable i can almost juggle them. excellent choice for all skill levels as these blades will most certainly survive your learning process.
customer_reviews.author: Papajoekr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid knives
customer_reviews.text: I'm by no means an expert knife thrower but I think these are pretty good knives for a beginer. They're pretty solidly built compared to some of the others I've tried so they are pretty forgiving when you make a mistake and don't bend as easily. As long as you're using a reasonably soft wood (like an average 2x12 from your local home supply store) or better yet a piece of pine these will stick just fine.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: on the fence? just buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are just as awesome as I thought they would be, right length and weight for a quality product. Some are scratched but I am going to throw them and they are meant to be thrown. Good weight for halfs, full, 1.5 and 2 rotations with some ease and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McKay

customer_reviews.title: The case is really nice too. Not a very good beginners set as ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and well built. The case is really nice too. Not a very good beginners set as they are pretty large. I do not know much about throwing knives but am having fun trying to teach myself to throw.
customer_reviews.author: justin miklebost

customer_reviews.title: They work for me!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of throwers. They are big, hefty and really bite into my target (when I can get them to stick!). The sheath that comes with is real leather, nice and sturdy. I have another set that came with a nylon sheath that I've already cut through. Plus, they look really bad a**!! 😝
customer_reviews.author: MzKitty421

customer_reviews.title: Chinese product, lack of quality.
customer_reviews.text: These look good out of the box. However, you can tell right away that they were made cheaply. The sheath is not leather. It is some type of soft plastic. Out of The three knives that I received, none had the same point of balance. Two of them had damaged tips right out of the box. The box did not appear damaged. By the second time I used mine, two were bent and one broke in half. I didn't expect them to last forever but two uses. Come on. Nice design, poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time and is nice Heavy and solid not a flimsy set that will break easily. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tomc

customer_reviews.title: The Age of Ornan's J.C. Pilcher knife review
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been throwing knives for a terribly long time but I have enough experience to where I can tell a good knife from a bad one. Overall I have been very pleased with the competition triple knife throwing set. It is a very good knife as far a spin throwing goes. It's not that great if you like no spin but there are ways that you can do it. I have been throwing them around for a while and they as of yet show not signs of wear. This is overall a nice set of knives especially for spinning style throwers.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Throwing Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend. I already have 3 sets of these. well my set, and a set for each of my kids, we have used them alot and never had a problem with them at all.They are balanced well, and stick very nicely even at greater distance, I think because they are a little heavier. Great fun, great knives, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The handles r perfect for throwing and gliding out of ibes hand
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to throw and practice with, very comfortable and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria PierceMulliss

customer_reviews.title: Good product and only $20 with $20 off promotion (Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product and only $20 with $20 off promotion (Amazon 'store card'). Tough knives and pretty easy to throw. Hibben design, made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Everyone that has visited had to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Everyone that has visited had to give a try!
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really good throwing knives. Very heavy with predictable rotations. Handle sticks are common for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was trying to learn with this dinky little throwing knives. These things make a difference. They are a bit cumbersome at first, but once you get used to them, you can learn a lot quicker. I've only learned the spin technique, so I'm not so sure how good these are for no spin. Overall, a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Motocamp Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Had these for years...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my brother years ago, and he mentioned the other still using them! Seems like they are well constructed in one piece that is meant to last!
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Stepmother

customer_reviews.title: Impressive throwing set!
customer_reviews.text: Theses are not a small set of knives! They are large and heavy....and fun as hell! It takes a pretty hefty throw to get these knives in motion but they are fun and beautiful to hold. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: afloridapirate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice throwing knives, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this transaction. Arrived on time and the throwing knives are very nice, well balanced, sharp and easy to throw. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dorf Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they seem to be great quality. When you are throwing at dead/ soft wood, be careful because the handle sticks just as good as the tip. You wouldn't want to pull on the wrong end!! Great Knives they stick really good, they also have good weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of throwing knives!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at throwing knives, but these knives are great for experts as well. I stick about 88% of them, and their weight makes a deadly blow to anything you throw it at. The seller is great he/she will awnser any question you may have and the shipping was fast. Very satisfied with the knives.
customer_reviews.author: Abisael

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely my favorite throwing knives so far. For me they are the perfect size and weight for practicing my standard distances (1/2 to 1-1/2 rotations). They have great balance and have a nice contour to hold on to. They can certainly take a beating too!
customer_reviews.author: JacknKya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginners throwing knife
customer_reviews.text: Great shape with good balance!! Great knife for any beginner!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives.
customer_reviews.text: These knives showed me what throwing is all about. Great knives. Great size . Don't waste your money on the small knives. I now throw these and Bowie style knives .
customer_reviews.author: phillip  rodden

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are the longest and heaviest throwing knives I have ever seen. I am accustomed to throwing the smaller ones, so I haven't yet gotten the knack with these, but I still highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: love these knives for no spin but they can be used for all. Great balance, great penetration from its weight. Too much for a beginning child. Use a tree stump as a target, no plywood, no live tree, as it will soon be dead.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice job
customer_reviews.text: These throwing knives are top quality. It says competition grade, and they mean it. A little heavier than expected, but that's not a complaint. Would definitely recommend this product. I never got an update on the shipping in order to track the package. Probably because it got here faster than they could update the system. Arrived on the 3rd business morning after ordering. Nice job, people. That's how you earn return business.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and balance. Nice leather holster. All around quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT THROWING KNIVES
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner I have tried several different knives. The first time I tried these knives my percentage of sticks and accuracy probably went up 50%. I am going to order another set soon. They are also tough, I know this because I put several throws on top of the other throws.
customer_reviews.author: rick lansberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw. Overall, its a pretty decent knife set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: darkwaterdiver

customer_reviews.title: great set.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a few hours to get it down. very sturdy. moms wont be happy with their sons new hobby. need a large log round to throw into. and make sure you and observers stand back.
customer_reviews.author: BILL SCHULZ

customer_reviews.title: Great skill to try...
customer_reviews.text: Great knives. They have held up well while I'm learning to throw. I may purchase a bit lighter set once I graduate to up from a novice thrower. These will stay in use till then and perhaps beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives
customer_reviews.text: my 13yo daughter really likes these, she says they balance nicely in her hand, and have a good weight. they throw well. Other than that i think they look cool, and so we are happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha T

customer_reviews.title: Great item perfect for beginners and experts in throwing knifes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item perfect for beginners and experts in throwing knifes easy to learn with Evan if you don't know how to throw
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Hudon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Order was received within days. Quality was as outlined in description. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Trena D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these knives! It's someThing he wanted for years and these knives are perfect for beginners. Will be buying the next level set when he's mastered these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap throwing set
customer_reviews.text: Good balance, good hardness. The sheath is a little cheesy These aren't the little tiny throwing knives you find in some gas stations. These are heavy, solid throwers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Great product and professional vendor
customer_reviews.text: The product is first class and works better than expected. The vendor shipped everything protected and arrived in great shape. I would do business with vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Joef96

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of it. It looks well built. The holster is nice. I haven't used it yet. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Phan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set. I just received them today and they are much easier to throw then my old 6 inch set. They have a nice weight and seem to be built well. Also the sheath is nice ad sturdy and will hold all 3 knives.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great knives.
customer_reviews.text: Great knives I Would definitely buy again and Good price on them. All Gil hibben knives seem to be good quality. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TXSongGirl

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: These knives take a little getting used to. They are heavy. However, they are a lot of fun to throw. The sheath is difficult to put all three knives in, especially the last one. I look forward to mastering these knives. The weight makes them a little more challenging at first.
customer_reviews.author: Troy kirkup

customer_reviews.title: One of the best comp throwing knives out
customer_reviews.text: These Gil Hibbens compitition throwing knives are balanced and weight are perfect I purchased to sets you just can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely balanced. I haven't thrown them yet but suspect they will perform just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jkunze

customer_reviews.title: Competition throwers
customer_reviews.text: Another great creation by Gil Hibben great item well made well balanced if you are looking for a great quality throwing knife set check these out
customer_reviews.author: Shane Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Good, solid piece of metal; and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Richtig

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I've been throwing knives casually for the last three years. I ordered these a month ago and they are absolutely amazing! They are sturdy and easy to throw. I've already gotten two newbies into knive throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice. Buy these knifes
customer_reviews.text: I've been throwing knifes for a long time. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Fun! fun! fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great throwers. But what do you expect, Anything with a point that you can throw and sticks with a nice sounding THUD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these after being familiar with Gil Hibben knives and their quality. I was not dissapionted when I got them. They were not too sharp on the edges which lends them to throwing by the blade or handle, but they do have a sharp and durable tip. the case is nice too. Easy to spin throw or no-spin throw. Very pleased with the price from United Cutlery and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: traciwhit

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My order came in way before the estimate. These knifes are very high quality and are heavy. I am very pleased with both the knifes and the fast delivery speed. These knifes are dull on the sides and with a sharp point, they are well balanced. I learned how to throw on a much smaller knife . Also you will need a think target because these knifes hit hard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Throwing Knives
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives, but after reading up on throwing, I should have gone with a different set to learn with.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lenox

customer_reviews.title: Smooth throw
customer_reviews.text: These knives look big but are actually a good fit for any thrower. These are on the list of favorites.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives! no complaints
customer_reviews.text: These knives were beautiful right out of the box, super durable, and overall just nice in the hand. these knives are pretty heavy and hard hitters. throwing them at a makeshift 2x4 target they've already split some of the boards in half. i would recommend these to anyone that wants to get into throwing knives.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great throwing knives at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and a great product at a great price. The throwing knives are well balanced and easier to stick than the shorter versions I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: apglfrn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife, tested the quality too
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife set. They are large and solid. Threw it as hard as I could at hard fencing to see how they held up for a review and it didn't put a mark on it. They are heavy..be sure you can handle a large knife before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Knife Thrower
customer_reviews.text: Great knife to start throwing with, balanced with a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the best knives you can get for learning or if you ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best knives you can get for learning or if you want reliable throws. Don't waste your time with gimicky 'ninja' throwing knife sets. This is the only set you need.
customer_reviews.author: unix_geek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance and weight
customer_reviews.text: No better throwing knife exists period. I have purchased many throwing knives and have yet to find any knife that even compares to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stewart

customer_reviews.title: These knives are of pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about throwing knives, but its still a hobby of mine. These knives are of pretty good quality. They are quite heavy, so I personally don't throw these knives from the tip (I always do handle throws). I find it hard to do no-spin throws because they don't have a smooth spine. Whenever I throw these at an old palm tree in my back yard, I hear a satisfying thunk because they are quite hefty. However, they are a tad bit pricey. No regrets though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to pass the time when you are out at the lease!
customer_reviews.author: dusticles

customer_reviews.title: These are OK
customer_reviews.text: got 3 sets. 1 knife broke after 3 hours of throwing. keep in mind i am a beginner so a more knowledgeable thrower may not have broken it. What really pisses me off is the holes. what is the purpose of the dumb holes? to make it look cooler at expense of weaker construction? dumb decision if you ask me. people will be much happier if these would not break.
customer_reviews.author: Tas

customer_reviews.title: Best heavy throwing knife set I've seen
customer_reviews.text: A single edge variant might be better for throwing by the blade but the double edge has advantages too. The weight and balance are great and the set fits compactly in the single leather sheath
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are what throwing knives need to look and feel like worth every dime
customer_reviews.author: garett

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Heavy Throwers
customer_reviews.text: These throwing knives are the real deal. They are heavy, well ballanced and great quality. This is the best value for the money with out a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: out knife for me
customer_reviews.text: It is a good knife but not for me. My throwing style creates a bit of flutter with this one. It is the only knife I've ever missed the target with. Huge blade and I've stuck both ends. Not my throwing knife of choice. Don't think I can break it as it is tuff
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The knives are well balanced and sturdy. I recieved the knives and one was slightly bent. They immediately replaced it. Great customer service !
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: these things are big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: just what you need if you really need a throwing knife to go deep into a target (any target). I think this thing will not only penetrate but break a rib or some small bones if you hit your target just right (like a wild hog or local rabid dog chasing you around the yard).
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Throwing Knives
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durability! Would highly recommend these for anyone just starting out or been throwing for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Fun knives
customer_reviews.text: Fun knives.... I have never thrown before but really enjoy it. Knives seem to be very durable. And easily sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: rugger0005

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cost effective, reliable throwing knives out there. The other knives I bought usually has the tip bent after several uses but this one remains good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Nai Y Liang

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, they are too heavy. I have to throw them almost as hard as I can for them to stick into the board. Usually they stick into trees easily, but not always. Also, the rotation is different from my other throwing knives. I have to stand in a different spot and almost chuck them at the board and still, they fall out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: great knifes
customer_reviews.text: great knifes is my second set I love them. They are very durable and not to hard to sharpen I highly this product
customer_reviews.author: daniel j greene

customer_reviews.title: Good throwing knives...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy large knives. Good stick but they get beat up quickly. Can't use the blade to throw because they are too sharp, can only use handle to throw. Comes with nice leather sheath.
customer_reviews.author: 2moms3kids

customer_reviews.title: Finally a throwing knife with some authority
customer_reviews.text: For some reason... some throwing knives seem light and cheap. Not these. They are sturdy and should last. I need to learn how to throw them better though. : )
customer_reviews.author: Jim Peterson

product_meta.title: Gil Hibben Competition Triple Thrower Set - Large
product_meta.description: This awesome gear from United Cutlery is made of quality materials to ensure the best use of your item. Don't settle for anything less. Value items priced up to 90% less than other name brand goods.
feature_bullets: Safety and Durability tested for the toughest conditions
Quality materials used to make all United Products
For enthusiasts, collectors and tough users all over the world
